channel.title: Ikelys wavetable and "modifiers"
channel.description: This is my current project. A wavetable synth based on the tiar/XT objects. it features - 16 different wavetables. The wavetable excursion is controlled by a ramp generator with two rates (that can be positive or negative) that can be synched to the note on. - 16 different "modifier sequences" that will modify the wavetable though diverse kinds of modulations. - a low pass filter - chorus - delay - an oled scope - 4 voice polyphony Here is a small track made with this little synth. Multi track recording, no additional effect nor processing. https://soundcloud.com/thierry-rochebois-1/ikelys-blues

item.title: Ikelys wavetable and "modifiers"
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

This is my current project.
A wavetable synth based on the tiar/XT objects.

it features

  • 16 different wavetables. The wavetable excursion is controlled by a ramp generator with two rates (that can be positive or negative) that can be synched to the note on.
  • 16 different "modifier sequences" that will modify the wavetable though diverse kinds of modulations.
  • a low pass filter
  • chorus
  • delay
  • an oled scope
  • 4 voice polyphony

Here is a small track made with this little synth.
Multi track recording, no additional effect nor processing.

IMG_20200130_210732.jpg2941x2206 2.06 MB
